response.original_title: From One Night to Mrs. Billionaire
response.overview: In From One Night to Mrs. Billionaire movie: Claudia is the adopted daughter of the richest man, Kaden. She drugged and framed Anastasia, wanting to ruin her reputation and divorce her husband Lucius.In From One Night to Mrs. Billionaire movie: Claudia is the adopted daughter of the richest man, Kaden. She drugged and framed Anastasia, wanting to ruin her reputation and divorce her husband Lucius. However, Anastasia was rescued by the drunk Kaden by mistake and became pregnant with Kaden's only child.
response.title: From One Night to Mrs. Billionaire
